title: Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is incorrectly enabled.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu should be enabled or disabled based on the project's build status or other relevant factors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a project in the Java perspective.
2. Right-click to open the context-sensitive popup menu.
3. Observe that the 'Build' action is always enabled, regardless of the project's state or other conditions.
